answers.answer: There can be many reasons why you were premature. Best person to ask would be your mom or a relative that knows why. It can happen to anyone, don't stress.
Your best bet would be to ask your doctor if you are concerned about it...
Many reason can cause it. I went into preterm labor with my first at 34 weeks and it was cause I had rough sex that started contractions. I had to stay in the hospital the rest of my pregnancy.
Smoking,  stress,  diabetes,  high blood pressure. ..lots of things.Anything can happen

question: Ok so I'm 32 weeks and when my mom was pregnant with me she gave birth at 33 weeks. I just wanted to know so I can avoid it but why did she give birth so early? And could this happen to me because I'm her daughter?
title: what can cause premature birth?
